room_title: Escape room "The Cookhouse" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: I can't say enough good things about this place. We've tried the Cookhouse and the Great Room so far and loved both. The puzzles and attention to detail were fantastic. The owner, Steve, is also really friendly and fun to talk with. Our group is looking forward to trying the rest of the rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Cookhouse" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: We went with a group of six to do the Cookhouse and had such a great time!The riddles were challenging and well done. Some of them definitely took us by surprise! We escaped and can't wait to come back for the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Cookhouse" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: I played the Cook House escape room with a friend and we were paired up with a pair of 1st-time escape room players. The decor was pretty much the best I've ever seen in an escape room. Incredibly immersive. The puzzles were very good and not overly hard but still required thought.We escaped with 4 minutes remaining and used several clues. I've played about 12 different games in NY and NJ and this was the one I enjoyed the most. This is due to the incredible detail in the set design and the flow of the game.

room_title: Escape room "The Cookhouse" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: Our group of 6 did The Cookhouse and we absolutely loved it! Setting and storyline were awesome and actors were phenomenal! They really knew how to stay in character and were friendly! Keep them! :) Overall, a fun and chilling experience, would go back next year!

room_title: Escape room "The Cookhouse" by 13th Hour Haunted House in New York
review: What a great experience! We did the "Cookhouse" escape room and then went to their haunted house. It's one of the best around. I don't scare easy, but this was definitely thrilling!
